user.description: Set up a stop place or quay to monitor departures from. You can find your stop ID on [Entur's travel planner](https://entur.no/).

data_description.stop_ids: Enter one or more stop place IDs (e.g., NSR:StopPlace:337 or NSR:Quay:7203)
data_description.expand_platforms: Automatically expand stop places to include all quays/platforms
data_description.show_on_map: Include GPS coordinates in entity attributes for map display
data_description.line_whitelist: Only show departures for these specific line IDs (leave empty for all lines)
data_description.omit_non_boarding: Hide departures where boarding is not allowed (e.g., last stop)
data_description.number_of_departures: Number of upcoming departures to include in attributes

error.invalid_stop_id: No valid stop IDs provided. Stop IDs must contain 'StopPlace' or 'Quay'.

abort.invalid_stop_id: No valid stop IDs provided. Stop IDs must contain 'StopPlace' or 'Quay'.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue.title: YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue.description:
The Entur public transport YAML configuration could not be imported automatically.

Please remove the YAML configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and set up the integration through the Home Assistant UI instead.

Go to **Settings** > **Devices & Services** > **Add Integration** and search for "Entur public transport".
